channel.title: Need help with emote timers :/

item.title: Need help with emote timers :/
item.dc:creator: @tedyslilnoob tedyslilnoob
item.description:
@tedyslilnoob wrote:

How od i make it so each gfx it does have a like 0.5 sec delay or w.e? aslo can u make it so player turns invisble for emote?

[code]if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 7623) { //hitpoints

stillgfx(432, absY, absX);
stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
stillgfx(432, absY, absX);
stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
stillgfx(432, absY, absX);
stillgfx(432, absY, absX);
stillgfx(432, absY, absX);
stillgfx(432, absY, absX);
stillgfx(574, absY, absX);
}[/code]
